 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package org.ntnu.utility

Class Summary
Client GridPortalToolkit client side application in support of GRIDportal (http://gridportal.dynalias.org/) This client offers the following basic functions: + certificate request generation + MyProxy registration The code is based mostly on the cog-jglobus library (http://www.cogkit.org/)
Config This class serves as a global configuration module for the whole application.
GuiDialogPassword A generic password dialog which accepts a password of at least 6 characters and verifies it is in a valid charset.
GuiDialogViewCertificate This class is the certificate viewer, a simple text area which displays the details of the certificate.
GuiMainWindow The main gui class of the application.
GuiPanelAbout This class is the about pane, containing some information about the application, a logo and some buttons.
GuiPanelCertReqCreate The Create certificate request pane.
GuiPanelGeneric An abstract class which defines the framework for most of the panels in the application.
GuiPanelMailRequest This class is the Mail certificate signing request pane.
GuiPanelMyproxyReg This class is the Register with GRIDportal pane.
GuiPanelStatusBar This class provides the status bar for GuiPanelGeneric.
GuiPanelSummary This class is the Summary pane.
GuiToolbox This class provides some common gui functions.
GuiTreeTableModelCertificate This class is redundant and exists as a reference for possible future use.
GuiViewLicence This is the window displaying the licence, triggered by the button the about pane.
LibCert A library class to handle certificate request creation, can be invoked in a separate thread.
LibCommon A class to store common functions needed in the application.
LibMyProxy A library class to handle the MyProxy.store() operation, can be invoked as separate thread.
NorduGridCertificate A class to manage a certificate.
NorduGridCertificateObject An abstract class to handle a certificate or certificate request object.
NorduGridCertificateRequest A class to manage a certificate request.
NorduGridManager A centralized manager class to keep track of certificate objects.
NorduGridPrivateKey A class to manage a private key.
TestCert Helper class to verify certificate creation mechanism.
ThreadListener This class is used to receive error messages from the running thread.
TimerTaskUpdateStatusBar This class is a TimerTask which takes care of updating the gui while a thread is running.
 

Exception Summary
NorduGridCertCorruptException An exception class to distinguish the exception from any other.
